text:
Rita Aleksandri Sargsyan (, "née" Dadayan (), 6 March 1962 – 20 November 2020) was an Armenian socialite. She was the wife of President and Prime Minister Serzh Sargsyan from 1983 until her death.
From 2008 to 2018, she was the First Lady of Armenia.
Sargsyan was born to a military family in Stepanakert, Nagorno-Karabakh Autonomous Oblast. She was a music teacher.
Sargsyan died at the age of 58 from COVID-19 on 20 November 2020.
